DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the pharmacodynamics, pharmacokinetics and safety of 7-day-repeated doses of FYU-981 administered orally to male hyperuricemic patients with uric acid-overproduction or uric acid-underexcretion type. In addition, to investigate the additive effects of the combination of FYU-981 and topiroxostat administered orally to male hyperuricemic patients with uric acid-overproduction type.
DOC.brief_title: Study of FYU-981 in Hyperuricemia (Effect on Two Hyperuricemic Types)
DOC.criteria: Japanese adult subjects Serum urate level: >= 7.0mg/dL in patients Disease Type: Uric acidoverproduction Type or Uric acidunderexcretion Type Gouty arthritis within a year before start of study treatment Mixed type in the classification of hyperuricemia
